short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a Chrome extension that provides shortcuts to add key value pairs in local storage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension that allows you to download TestNG suites in xml format from Jenkins failed tests page so you can re-run failed tests instead of triggering your full suite of tests.
